<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/edd327cc070d9a05c12e88bc5c43a1e2a3086ae6|patch 8.2.0580: window size wrong if 'ea' is off and 'splitright' is on>
patch 8.2.0580: window size wrong if 'ea' is off and 'splitright' is on

Problem:    Window size wrong if 'ea' is off and 'splitright' is on and
            splitting then closing a window.
Solution:   Put abandoned window space in the right place. (Mark Waggoner)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/81ccbf199f0d553efdd57bec9bb8e23d91d2fb0d|patch 8.2.0581: Win32 console: the cursor position is always top-left>
patch 8.2.0581: Win32 console: the cursor position is always top-left

Problem:    Win32 console: the cursor position is always top-left.
Solution:   Revert the patch for restoring screen.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b4a549fb161a390834371db8370b1f75695e25d0|patch 8.2.0582: color ramp test does not show text colors>
patch 8.2.0582: color ramp test does not show text colors

Problem:    Color ramp test does not show text colors.
Solution:   Add a row of 16 text colors and 16 bold text colors.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0582: color ramp test does not show text colors · vim/vim@b4a549f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0582: color ramp test does not show text colors · vim/vim@b4a549f
attachments.text: Problem: Color ramp test does not show text colors. Solution: Add a row of 16 text colors and 16 bold text colors.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/cb711abf0f71d8c743cf73c76077f52e17732a8c|patch 8.2.0583: Vim9: # comment not recognized in :def function>
patch 8.2.0583: Vim9: # comment not recognized in :def function

Problem:    Vim9: # comment not recognized in :def function.
Solution:   Recognize and skip # comment.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0583: Vim9: # comment not recognized in :def function · vim/vim@cb711ab
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0583: Vim9: # comment not recognized in :def function · vim/vim@cb711ab
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: # comment not recognized in :def function. Solution: Recognize and skip # comment.
